mapper.sql:
FROM infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1
And IfcgDelNy = 1 And IfcgDelNy = 0
AND ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfcgName},'%')
AND a.ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.ifcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgNameEng , a.ifcgDelNy
limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}
select a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgDelNy from infrCodeGroup a where 1=1 and ifcgDelNy = 0 and ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
SELECT a.ifcdSeq , a.ifcdName , a.ifcdDelNy FROM infrCode a WHERE 1=1 AND ifcdDelNy = 0 AND infrCodeGroup_ifcgSeq = #{shIfcgSeq}
select a.ifcdSeq , a.ifcdName , a.ifcdDelNy from infrCode a where 1=1 and ifcdDelNy = 0 and ifcdSeq = #{ifcdSeq}
